h2_title: Green-Capped Martialist Boss Fight and Guide
content: To start, he can spin his flaming chakram in front of him, using it as portal to open a quick fiery beam in your direction, which will require a quick dodge to the side to avoid.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Green-Capped_Martialist.md', within the main section titled 'Green-Capped Martialist', specifically from the subsection 'Green-Capped Martialist Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
To start, he can spin his flaming chakram in front of him, using it as portal to open a quick fiery beam in your direction, which will require a quick dodge to the side to avoid.
